name: surface-match
author: Washington University School of Medicin
command-line: wb_command -surface-match [MATCH SURFACE FILE] [INPUT SURFACE FILE] [OUTPUT SURFACE NAME]
description:
SURFACE MATCH.

The Input Surface File will be transformed so that its coordinate ranges (bounding box) match that of the Match Surface File

inputs.name: Input Surface File
inputs.description: File containing surface that will be transformed
